categories.name: Welding Machines
categories.summary: Industrial-grade inverter and MIG welding machines for fabrication units, plant maintenance teams, and OEM production lines.

seo.title: Welding Machines | JMK Enterprise
seo.description: Source industrial welding machines with consistent arc performance, high duty cycle, and dependable after-sales support from JMK Enterprise.

products.title: ArcMaster 400A Inverter Welding Machine
products.shortDescription: Heavy-duty inverter arc welder for continuous industrial operation.
products.description: ArcMaster 400A is built for demanding shop-floor duty where welding consistency and uptime are critical. The machine delivers stable output for structural fabrication, repair work, and production welding jobs.

products.title: PowerMIG 350 Pulse Welding System
products.shortDescription: Production-ready MIG unit for mild steel and stainless fabrication.
products.description: PowerMIG 350 Pulse supports high-speed production welding with reduced spatter and excellent bead appearance. It is suitable for fabrication contractors, OEM workshops, and industrial assembly lines.

categories.name: Welding Consumables (Electrodes & Wires)
categories.summary: Reliable electrodes and welding wires for structural steel, repair welding, and high-throughput fabrication environments.

seo.title: Welding Consumables | JMK Enterprise
seo.description: Industrial welding consumables including low-hydrogen electrodes and copper coated MIG wires for stable weld quality and productivity.

products.title: E7018 Low Hydrogen Electrodes
products.shortDescription: Moisture-resistant low hydrogen electrodes for crack-resistant welds.
products.description: JMK E7018 low hydrogen electrodes are engineered for high-strength joints and reduced hydrogen cracking risk. Suitable for heavy fabrication, pressure vessel jobs, and structural welding applications.

products.title: ER70S-6 Copper Coated MIG Wire
products.shortDescription: High-feed copper coated wire for smooth arc transfer and low spatter.
products.description: ER70S-6 copper coated MIG wire from JMK Enterprise offers clean feeding and stable performance across automated and semi-automatic setups, ideal for high-volume fabrication operations.

categories.name: Tools & Hardware
categories.summary: Workshop-ready industrial tools and hardware essentials selected for durability, repeat use, and operational safety.

seo.title: Tools & Hardware | JMK Enterprise
seo.description: Industrial tools and hardware solutions from angle grinders to precision vices for B2B buyers, dealers, and fabrication units.

products.title: ProCut 5-inch Industrial Angle Grinder
products.shortDescription: Rugged angle grinder for cutting, deburring, and surface preparation.
products.description: ProCut 5-inch angle grinder is designed for fabrication and maintenance teams requiring reliable power delivery and ergonomic control during long operational cycles.

products.title: ForgeLock 6-inch Heavy Duty Bench Vice
products.shortDescription: Cast steel vice for clamping and precision workshop operations.
products.description: ForgeLock 6-inch bench vice provides firm clamping force and excellent repeatability for drilling, cutting, and fitting operations in industrial workshops.
